DOC.brief_summary: The 001 DIOR study prospective , multicenter registry percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) assess clinical success , efficacy safety Paclitaxel-eluting balloon DIOR ( Eurocor GmbH , Germany ) treatment de novo ostial bifurcate lesion ( 001 Medina classification ) . The DIOR balloon use treat stenotic site branch .
DOC.criteria: De novo bifurcate lesion 001 Medina classification , significant stenosis ostium side branch reference vessel diameter big equal 2.0mm ; DIOR balloon use treat side branch . The patient clinical evidence myocardial ischemia ( stable unstable angina , acute non acute myocardial infarction , silent ischemia : ECG , exercise test , etz ... ) As maximal length DIORTM balloon 30 mm , eligible lesion longer 25 mm ensure adequate drug elution treat segment , avoid phenomenon `` geographical miss '' . Target lesion ( ) stenosis equal 50 % visual estimation . Cardiogenic shock Any serious disease might limit patient survival less one year Inability perform clinical followup period 1 year Left main bifurcation lesion : ostial leave circumflex ostial leave anterior descend artery stenosis .
